item.title: A Laymanâ€™s Guide for Data Scientists to create APIs in minutes
item.description: Have you ever been in a situation where you want to provide your model predictions to a frontend developer without them having access to model related code? Or has a developer ever asked you to create an API that they can use? I have faced this a lot.
